segments.text: So Emily , what do you like to do for fun ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like to go to the movies . What do you do in your free time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I also like going to the movies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well that's great ! It's nice that we have something in common .
segments.speaker: S2
